DOC.brief_summary: This six month , subject-masked , contralateral , parallel-group , randomised , daily wear study . All subject wear Test lens one eye Control lens eye . Data first four week Test Control lens exposure use FDA 510 ( k ) submission .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation HPT Treated Rigid Contact Lenses Made From Roflufocon D
DOC.criteria: Willing able sign inform consent form Aged ≥18 year old Experienced wearer rigid gas permeable contact lenses Subject 's habitual contact lens must make Contamac 's Optimum Extra ( roflufocon D ) material Subjects must own spectacle contact lenses prior enrolment trial Spherical power 10.00 D +10.00 D ( vertex distance 0 mm ) Corneal astigmatism ≤2.00 D • Eye injury surgery within 3 month immediately prior enrolment trial Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit Currently enrol ophthalmic clinical trial Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution , determine investigator Any use medication contact lens wear could contradict , determine investigator Current extendedwear user ( sleepin overnight ) Current monovision lens wearer Current wearer multifocal contact lenses Current wearer toric contact lens ( front surface design ) Current wearer astigmatic contact lens ( posterior surface design ) Has report `` Strong '' comfort vision preference eye habitual RGP lenses Unacceptable fit habitual lens Pregnant woman nurse mother Bestcorrected visual acuity bad 6/9 ( LogMAR : +0.20 ; Snellen decimal : 0.63 )
